Checklist. Overall tips\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SAP FC Checklist (please go to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://SAP.epam.com \"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SAP.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and scroll down till “FC Checklist” pane) is an application through which the majority of key controls over EPAM Financial Statements are performed.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you need to work with FCC (please ask for your Manager’s advice regarding this topic) please observe KB page related to SAP FC Checklist: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMSFCL/FC+Checklist\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"FC Checklist - EPAM SAP Financial closure checklist - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":413932,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/88f9846c-bc91-41d2-804f-29f231364bb2/Screenshot_8.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/88f9846c-bc91-41d2-804f-29f231364bb2/Screenshot_8.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Screenshot_8.png\",\"name\":\"Screenshot_8.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"88f9846c-bc91-41d2-804f-29f231364bb2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":976,\"height\":581},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please learn some additional info about FCC below.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Some part of key and non-key controls and procedures over EPAM's FS presented there as a tasks (for example task on FA disposal check or task on goodwill impairment, task on bank statements check and etc.).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"That was implemented for tracking convenience the same as for storage of files that are frequently checked by auditors.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each task in FCC should be performed by a responsible employee. The evidence of a task performance (for example, a table with the calculation of AP aging) must be attached to the task by a person who has prepared it.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Then the file in the task is checked by its approver. If there are no objections from their side, the actions, resulted from the task (for example, payments to counterparties or payment of wages, etc.), are performed.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Also, upon confirmation of the task, respective entries are parked and posted in SAP.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please keep in mind that not all accounting procedures are implemented within FCC, so you will have to make some additional postings / calculations / corrections on your own and confirm the figures via e-mail – for more details please contact your immediate Manager.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SAP Reconciliation/ Variance analysis.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There is an e-based SAP platform called “Fiori”. Fiori platform/ interface provides some advanced features for users (increased speed, stability, abilities for synchronization with another ERP systems, etc.). If shortly, for end User Fiori platform is just an “SAP in browser”.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"One of the main directions of Fiori usage in EPAM is making documentation of some Month Closure Procedures directly in SAP on basis of up-to-date SAP data without e-mail conversations or side programs (such as FC Checklist, for example).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please follow this link to visit e-SAP (Fiori) in browser: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sap.epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://sap.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"sap.epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please enter your SAP credentials to log in (make sure that Global protect is turned on):\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":286574,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/fc0dc2fe-31f2-4fa1-a3b4-578f3a68d825/Screenshot_9.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/fc0dc2fe-31f2-4fa1-a3b4-578f3a68d825/Screenshot_9.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Screenshot_9.png\",\"name\":\"Screenshot_9.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"fc0dc2fe-31f2-4fa1-a3b4-578f3a68d825\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":746,\"height\":508},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\nThe link below summarizes SAP Fiori guidelines. Please study at least “getting started” and “general functionality” menu. “BS Reconciliation” and “PL Variance” will guide you through SAP Fiori Month Closure procedures – please check it in case you are responsible for such kind of activities.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMFICO/SAP+Fiori\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SAP Fiori - EPAM SAP Finance & Accounting - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":396942,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4e274d7b-761b-4403-aabe-7999f791f21c/Screenshot_10.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4e274d7b-761b-4403-aabe-7999f791f21c/Screenshot_10.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Screenshot_10.png\",\"name\":\"Screenshot_10.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"4e274d7b-761b-4403-aabe-7999f791f21c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029.0103759765625,\"height\":622.9635986966124},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You are done with CA general introduction!
